verbs.description: Roche [V: has] had no contact with U.S. President Donald Trump 's personal attorney Michael Cohen , said company Chief Executive Severin Schwan .
[ARG0: Roche] has [V: had] [ARG1: no contact with U.S. President Donald Trump 's personal attorney Michael Cohen] , said company Chief Executive Severin Schwan .
[ARG1: Roche has had no contact with U.S. President Donald Trump 's personal attorney Michael Cohen] , [V: said] [ARG0: company Chief Executive Severin Schwan] .
